81.当店の人気商品 きんのゆびわは|あのキラキラした宝石の魔物も 持っているとか。|:
Our most popular item, the Gold Ring, is also|in the possession of the glittering jewel|monster. If you need a few, try killing them.|
|! Attention !|We will not be held responsible if you are|beaten to a pulp as a result.

97.<center>第３回 モンスター格闘大会チャンピオン|<center>ピエール: 3rd Monster Arena Tournament Champion|               Goowain's Grave

98.<center>まもの使い グスコフの相棒|<center>シーザー ここに眠る: Monster Master Guskov's partner|             Caesar, rests here.

99.<center>まもの使い ドロテオの相棒|<center>サーラ ここに眠る: Monster Master Doroteo's partner|              Saara, rests here.

100.返事がない……。|ただの 壊れたカカシのようだ。: There's no reply.|It's just a broken scarecrow.

101.扉は ボロボロに壊れており 開きそうにない。: The door is broken and will not open.

102.<center>神より与えられた この広い世界で|<center>我らは 姿の異:
In this world given to us by God, we vowed to|live together with our friends of different|shapes and sizes, and support each other.|
|With the hope that this vow will be eternal,|I will leave behind the image of my beloved|friends in this spot, the center of the world.

103.<center>『風の民 エルフ』|<center>自然を愛し 森と共に生きる|:
"Elves, People of Wind"| They are beautiful people with| wings on their back who love|
| nature and live with the forest.| They value tradition, studied the ways| of the world, and produced|
| many excellent spellcasters.

104.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』|<center>厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生き:
"Ogres, People of Fire"| They live strong in the harsh lands,| with large bodies, horns and|
| tails. They are belligerent,| respect the strong and use their| superior strength and stamina to|
| risk their lives for the weak.

105.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』|<center>雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大:
"Dwarves, People of Earth"| They live with the earth, blessed by| the majestic mountains, with small|
| bodies and big ears. With their high| technology and strong desires,| they built many advanced civilizations|
| with their pure dexterity and speed.

106.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』|<center>海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自:
"Weddie, People of Water"| They live freely on beautiful islands in| the sea and their bodies are blue like|
| water. They hate constraints and value| singing and love. They use their speed| and strength to fight only when they|
| have to protect those they love.

107.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』|<center>絵本のような色彩の町で 楽:
"Pukulipo, People of Flowers"| In a town with colors like a picture| book, they have fluffy, adorable|
| little bodies living in search of fun.| Born with strong magical power and| dexterity, they are more|
| passionate about creating things| for fun than for fighting.

108.<center>『勇の民 人間』|<center>どんな地でも 生きていける|<:
"Humans, People of Courage"| They have bodies that are not too big or| too small to survive in any land. They|
| may not have any outstanding| qualities, but when faced with a| crisis, they have the courage to|
| stand up against it.

109.<center>『空の民 竜族』|<center>はるか かなたより|<cent:
"Dragons, People of the Sky"| The holy ones who watch over the world| from afar. Whenever there is a|
| conflict on earth, they fly over and| bring peace with their great powers.

120.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた|<center>すべての 生き:
All the living beings who lived peacefully| in this world are in danger of| extinction. Now there are two suns|
| rising in the sky. The second sun has turned| this world into a hell since it appeared| and is now running through the sky|
| at will, scorching the earth, drying| up the sea, and sending people| into a burning despair. We have no way|
| of knowing why there were two suns. All we| know is that all living things| on this earth are about to be destroyed.

239.<pc>は|石碑に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。|<br>|白き道は 白き光にて:
You read the words carved on the stone|monument.|
|The white path will be opened with white|light. That light will rest in the white door.|
|The gray path will be opened with gray light.|That light will rest in the gray door.|
|The black path will be opened with black|light. That light will rest in the black door.|
|When the three paths are opened, we will reach|the Creatorium.

308.<left>アスフェルド学園行きの列車は|<left>直通運転と なっております: This train is a direct line to Asfeld Academy.|Please be careful not to miss the return trip|time.

309.<left>全生徒 完全個室！|<left>あなたの 快適な学園生活をサポートす: Student Private Rooms!|This is a dormitory that supports your|comfortable school life.

310.<left>グランゼドーラ駅行き列車の|<left>発車時刻が 貼りだされている: The departure time of the train to the Gran|Zedora Station is posted on the wall.

312.<left>サクラの季節に なりました！|<left>入学 進級 おめでとうござ: It's cherry blossom season!|Congratulations on making it to the next|grade. I hope you have a fruitful year.

313.<left>気温の高い日が 続きそうです！|<left>通学時の 日よけ対策は: It's going to be a very hot day!|Protect yourself from the sun while commuting|to school. Be careful of heat stroke.

314.<left>寒暖の差が 激しい季節に なってきました！|<left>気候に合った: It's getting to be a season of extreme|temperature swings! Dress appropriately for|the weather and take good care of yourselves.

315.<left>雪道は すべりやすく たいへん危険です。|<left>登下校の際には: Snowy roads are slippery and very dangerous.|Please take extra care on your way to and from|school.

There was a piece of paper on the wall that|read, "Asfeld Academy Senryu Contest Results".|You read the poems that were selected.|
|Honerable Mentions:|
|If you come across|a Fel Mark, bring it to the|school shop right away!|
|For the time being,|whenever you're in a pinch,|yakisoba bread!|
|Merit Award:|
|It is in the school|yard where you will discover|the light of friendship.|
|The vegetable|garden has some crisp lettuce|that's growing in it.|
|First Prize:|
|I will die later.|I am in the middle of|a test period.

317.<left>『アスフェルド学園新聞 号外』|<left>昨日未明 校舎内で ドル:
"Asfeld Academy News - Extra Issue"|In the early hours of yesterday, a student|using a dolboard collided with another student|
|in the school building, resulting in injury!|Fortunately, the injuries to the students were|minor, but the student council led a campaign|
|to enforce the rules of dolboard use. Student|Council President Eisel said the following,|"Rules are there so that everyone can have a|
|good time, right? Let's make Asfeld Academy a|place where all students follow the rules and|are kind to others and to themselves!"

318.<left>クラス対抗の さまざまな催しがあるようだ。: There are a variety of class rivalry events.

|If you have any idea where he is please|contact Halbel at Ⅱ‐Wulfspade.

322.<left>勉学！ 部活！ 寮生活！|<left>なんでも そろう！|<left: Studying! Club Activities! Dorm Life!|We've got everything!|Welcome to the school shop!!
